item.description:
The 2011 Boston Asian Film Festival is kicking off on Thursday November 10th Thursday 8pm with a film called 'Almost Perfect' with Kelly Hu and Edison Chen. No idea what the film is about but Kelly Hu and Edison Chen are in the movie so let's go see them in a movie.

Will meet at Chipotle for dinner next to the Brattle Theater at 6pm. I'm not sure how popular this will be but if you want to make sure you have tickets to get in, you can go here to purchase your tickets in advance instead of getting it at the door.

http://www.baaff.org/ticket-info.html

See you all there!

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: 2011 Boston Asian Film Festival
